title: Get ready, Qatar: World-famous circus Cirque du Soleil arrives April 8–13, with tickets from QR175 now on sale
summary_full: Doha gears up for a spectacular treat as Cirque du Soleil's acclaimed show 'Corteo' arrives for a limited six-day run from April 8-13, 2026.  Eight captivating performances at the Qatar National Convention Centre promise a blend of acrobatics, music, and fantasy.  Tickets are on sale now, offering a rare chance for residents to witness this world-renowned production locally.
